sources.title: Married To A Baller (Love and Football) | Full Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**

Married To A Baller (Love and Football) - Charles Miles had everything: a beautiful wife, an adorable son, a fortune, a dream career as a pro football player, and his health. But after a terrible car accident, his life is about to change. Confined to a wheelchair, he must struggle with his flighty wife Victoria, his overbearing mother, and the arrival of Danielle, the one person who may be able to change his life, in order to one day walk again. This is his journey of overcoming obstacles, fighting for what is right, and knowing when to let go.

2013
Stars: Amin Joseph, Efé, Noel Gibson

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
